description.message: Reload an unpacked extension with one click, hotkey or automatically.

background_tab_manifest_3_msg_text.message: This is the background tab. This tab is required for Advanced Extension Reloader to function correctly, don't close it.

ports_help_text.message: Ports separated by commas that should expect a messages to reload extensions. You will need multiple ports if you develop multiple extensions.

full_reload_timeout_help_text.message: The amount of time to wait for confirmation that an extension has started reloading using browser.runtime.reload();. If no confirmation is received, the extension will be reloaded using browser.management.setEnabled(id, false); browser.management.setEnabled(id, true);.

click_action_help_text.message:
An object that defines what happens when you click on the browser action icon or hit "Reload extension main" hotkey specified at chrome://extensions/shortcuts.

Accepted properties:

hard: boolean
Whether to reload the extension. If set to false, the background page will not reload. The manifest.json will not reload even if this option is true. If you want to reload it, you need to do it the usual way. Can be combined with "all tabs".

all tabs: boolean
Whether to reload all tabs as opposed to just reloading the current tab.

ext_id: string || false
An id of an extension to reload in "hard" mode. If unspecefied or false, all extensions will reload.

Example:

{
    "all tabs": false,
    "hard": true,
    "ext_id": "ffhljpfecjcfjdaneehmhdgplkaafnbb"
}

context_menu_actions_help_text.message: An array of objects with the same schema as seen in "Extension's icon click action" that define additional reload actions that appear in the browser action context menu. Keep in mind that there are limit on how many items can appear there. You can also use reload actions defined here by hitting one of the "Reload extension X" hotkeys, where X is the position in the array.

open_background_tab_automatically_help_t.message: Always keep one background tab open, reopening it if it's closed.

open_position_in_tab_strip_label_text.message: Open position in the tab strip
